replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Aly. Make sure you send it to us using this form: https://www.facebook.com/help/127103474099499/ -Ovidio

I need help, my sister's Facebook ID cannot log on since last Friday, she said it might because her network was not stable, and the IP changed more frequently. As the instruction of Facebook, she tried to upload her Personal ID which issued by the People's Republic of China, but after upload the picture, Facebook indicated that the Servers Failed. What should her do to get back  the Facebook ID?
